author: kboom_ro
content: You can query the client's metrics API, I reckon that could be one way.  There's grafana, prometheus for remote monitoring, idk what performance parameters you want to track

author: kamuik16
content: Hey! If the program starts in 10th June, why are some people already adding some development updates?

author: inspector.butters
content: I was mostly interested in seeing how much time each function/process takes and then finding the performance bottlenecks and optimization points. I think I can do that using Geth's timers, but if you know a simpler way please let me know.

author: inspector.butters
content: I think the "week 0" column is where you can post an update in, if you already have some ideas or goals in mind, or want to get a headstart. otherwise you can just start from next week in "week 1".
